analysis.description:
Reentrancy in DOWCrowdfund.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x4d066feb188ee4582147d82cb901277425432aa7.sol#330-352):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4d066feb188ee4582147d82cb901277425432aa7.sol#339-350)
	- token.addToAllocation(amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4d066feb188ee4582147d82cb901277425432aa7.sol#342-343)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundTransfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4d066feb188ee4582147d82cb901277425432aa7.sol#336)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/16/0x4d066feb188ee4582147d82cb901277425432aa7.sol#344-347)

DOWCrowdfund.endCrowdfund (/unique_chucks/16/0x4d066feb188ee4582147d82cb901277425432aa7.sol#308-326) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(remainingTokenHolder,remainingToken) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4d066feb188ee4582147d82cb901277425432aa7.sol#318-321)
